text: [Alloh taolo] Az osmon oʙe furū ʙorid, on goh rūdho har jak ʙa andozai [ƣunçoişi] xud çorī şudand va seloʙ kafk rūji xud ʙarovard va az on ci ʙar otaş meafruzand [va megudozand], to zevar jo koloe ʙa dast ovarand, [niz] kafke hammonandi on [az oʙ ʙarmeojad]. Alloh taolo haqqu ʙotilro incunin misol mezanad. Va ammo kafk ʙa kanore meravad va nest megardad, vale on ci ʙa mardum sud merasonad, ʙar zamin [ʙoqī] memonad. Alloh taolo masalho incunin ʙajon mekunad
